name: The name of the tool - includes the publisher if the name is not unique.
publisher: The name of the person or organization that publishes/maintains the tool.
description: Short description of what the tool does.
homepage_url: Home page for the tool. This will often be the same as the Repository URL.
repository_url: Repository where the code for this tool is maintained.
source_download: URL for downloading the project source releases.
package_download: URL for downloading one or more packages published by this project to a package manager repository like npm or PyPI.
documentation_url: Primary URL for the primary project documentation if different from the Homepage URL.
service_url: URL for API access to a data service or UI access to a demonstration system.
language: The primary language(s) used for software development in this project.
software_license: The license that applies to the software from this project - in SPDX License Expression format.
data_license: The license that applies to data provided by this project - in SPDX License Expression format.
service_license: License that applies to API access to a data service or UI access to a demonstration system.
type: The general type of tool - 'Application', 'CLI Utility', 'Library' or 'Service'
platforms: The platform(s) for the tool - 'Container', 'Linux', 'MacOS', 'Windows' or other.
notes: Additional information about your tool - as needed.
